name: Love me Less
description:
Love me Less is a visual novel/dating simulator that explores the concept of toxic relationships and the effects that it can have on a person’s emotional well being and mental state. 

The player is introduced to the antagonist of the game, Elliot, when you bump into him at a party.  He is quite charming and the player is mesmerized by him easily. 

Follow the storyline as the relationship develops further and unfolds into something much less sweet. Make difficult decisions that test your friendships and reveal the darker side of your relationship.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Trigger Warning:
Toxic relationships. Emotional manipulation.
Events in the game may evoke negative emotions. 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Love me Less is a work in progress game for the final project of third year Game Design at the University of Witwatersrand, South Africa. We, as the development team, would appreciate feedback. Please fill in the following form: https://forms.gle/7Xg25Rx8yAsBevQV7
